name: ASTExtension
author: NotAKidoS
description:
Extension mod for [Avatar Scale Tool](https://github.com/NotAKidoS/AvatarScaleTool):
- VR Gesture to scale
- Persistent height
- Copy height from others

Best used with Avatar Scale Tool, but will attempt to work with found scaling setups.
Requires already having Avatar Scaling on the avatar. This is **not** Universal Scaling.
changelog:
- Fixed an issue where the parameter calibration process would sometimes result in the mouth pointer being misplaced when generated.
- Fixed IsGripping check for Knuckles controllers not requiring *both* hands as intended.
